posts.text:
This I-Phone 3gs 32gb Is New Without the box. I got it from the I-phone store. 
As of right now this I-Phone is not jail broken or unlocked. However, if you would like it to be jail-broken I can jail break it for you before you get it Just send me a message that you would indeed like it to be jail broken.
This phone comes with the following accessories: 
1 Used Apple Sync Cable
1 New Wall Outlet to USB Charger Port 
1 New Set of Apple Head Phones With Built In Microphone
1 Rubber I Phone 3gs Case 
80.000-90.000kr and it's yours.

Is it under warranty here in Iceland?
Is the iPhone black or white?
Black . isn't bought here. no warranty.

hér koma myndir.
Bluetooth headset comes with it for free.
